name: Smudge (oscarduretto)
description:
Smudge is lost, help Smudge home.

This is a simple puzzle game where you must navigate levels to get to the door without trapping yourself in the mess Smudge leaves behind him.

Background:

The game is short and simple, as it was the result of a One Week Game Jam, where total work came to approximately 43 hours. All assets, code and levels were built in that one week (with the exception of music and sound). This game jam was not associated with any specific competition and was just a personal timeline to proof of concept one of my ideas.

It is unlikely any further changes/updates will be made to the game as it currently stands (except of course for game-breaking bugs). This was simply a fun short project.
